000050678-d-08-19-08-CSX.Narrative: WHILE HUMPING OFF OF SWITCH LIST WB1428 LINES 9(PROX 16819), 10 (PROX 16501), 11 (UTLX 12426) AND 12(UTLX 67775) WERE ALL CUT IN SINGLE CAR CUTS. LINES 9 AND 10 WERE DESTINED FOR CLASS TRACK 38, LINES 11 AND 12 WERE DESTINED FOR CLASS TRACK 43. LINE 9 WAS CUT FROM THE HUMP AT 12:05 AND 13 SECONDS.THE  CUT LIGHT ON THE HUMP READ THAT THE FOLLOWING THREE CARS WERE HUMPED AT THE SAME TIME CAUSING THE COMPUTER TO THINK THAT WE WERE HUMPING AN ARTICULATED CAR. THE HUMP COMPUTER THEN PROCEEDED TO LOCK UP THE CARS IN THE NORTH MASTER CAUSING LINE 9 TO STOP. WHEN LINE 10 CAME INTO THE RETARDER IT THEN KNOCKED LINE 9 OUT WHICH THEN PROCEEDED INTO  TRACK 38. LINE 10 THEN STALLED AND WAS STRUCK BY LINES 11 THEN 12 WHICH CAUSED LINE 10 (PROX 16501) TO BE DETRUCKED. ALL FOUR OF THE CARS SHOW ENTERINGTHE MATER RETARDER AT 6.87 MPH.

CONDUCTOR FOUND REAR THREE CARS DERAILED ACCOUNTSTIFF TRUCK BOLSTER (ACFX 84619) IMPROPER SWIVELING.

SF0808101-d-08-09-08-BNSF.Narrative: UP SWITCH CREW (YTU55-09) WAS SHOVING BACK TO A JOINT IN THE EAST END OF TRACK 1002, WHEN THE EMPLOYEE'S LINE OF SIGHT PROTECTION THE POINT WAS BLOCKED BY ANOTHER YARD JOB DRAGGING UP THE LEAD IN FRONT OF HIM.  THIS CAUSED BYPASS COUPLERS BETWEEN THE UTLX 77471 AND THE ECUX 631041 TO DERAIL AT THE JOINT.  UP HUMAN FACTOR RESPONSIBILITY.
